ItemType.name: ammunition box
ItemType.description: These heavy metal boxes are used to hold ammunition of some type. Unfortunately, you cannot decode the markings that list their actual contents.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 shells ammunition box
ItemType.description: This box contains Akan 30 cannon shell cartridges.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 thermo shells ammunition box
ItemType.description: This box contains Akan 30 thermo shell cartridges.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 shield reapers ammunition box

ItemType.description: This box contains Akan 30 tracing cartridges.

ItemType.description: This box contains Akan 30 high speed cartridges.

ItemType.description: This box contains Akan 30 fragmenting cartridges.

ItemType.name: Contraband ammunition box
ItemType.description: This sealed container, made out of an old ammunition box, contains illegal items.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (cost count illegalItems) (setq illegalItems (itmCreateRandom "* +Illegal; -ContrabandBox; -SmugglersHold; -ID;" "ruccc ccur-"))
(setq cost (itmGetPrice illegalItems)) (setq cost (if (eq cost 0) 100 cost)) (setq count (divide (random 2000 4000) cost)) (setq count (if (ls count 1) 1 count)) (setq illegalItems (itmCreate (itmGetUNID illegalItems) count))
(intAmmoBoxOpen illegalItems) )

ItemType.name: booby-trapped ammunition box
ItemType.description: This ammunition box has been rigged to disable the ship when it is opened.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (objMakeParalyzed gSource (random 450 900)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "The box explodes; ship disabled by EMP!")
; Identify the box (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove box (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: empty ammo box
ItemType.description: This ammunition box is already empty.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil
(objSendMessage gSource Nil "The box is empty!")
; Identify the box (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove box (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: booby-trapped ammo box
ItemType.description: This ammunition box has been rigged to disable the visual display of the ship when opened.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (shpMakeBlind gSource 3000) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "The box explodes: Visual display temporarily damaged!")
; Identify the box (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove box (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )
